original_title: はじめて彼女ができたので幼なじみとSEXや中出しの練習をする事にした
overview: The 19th blockbuster youth love story series! I got a girlfriend for the first time! But... I'm a virgin and I don't really know how to get along with girls! At times like this, consult your childhood friend Wan! Then ... "For the time being, why don't you throw away your virginity?" She doesn't want her to find out that she's a virgin and doesn't know how to do it, so she decides to practice sex! And I finally realized that I was practicing even blowjob, cunnilingus and vaginal cum shot. I…. I love dogs!
title: I Got My First Girlfriend, And So I Decided To Practice My Creampie Sex Game With my Friend Wan Horikita
